task: Develop a basic 'Final Fantasy' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Convert a melodic element into a rhythmic element'.
name: Final Fantasy: Rhythm of Fate

branding_data.short_description: Embark on an epic journey in 'Final Fantasy: Rhythm of Fate', where melodies transform into rhythms guiding your fate.
branding_data.detailed_description: 'Final Fantasy: Rhythm of Fate' is a unique twist on the classic RPG formula, where the enchanting melodies traditionally associated with the series are transformed into rhythmic elements that influence gameplay. As players traverse the fantastical world, they must engage in rhythm-based battles where timing and precision dictate the flow of combat. The game's narrative unfolds through a series of rhythm challenges that blend storytelling with musical elements, providing an immersive experience where every beat shapes the destiny of the characters. With its innovative approach to gameplay and rich storytelling, 'Final Fantasy: Rhythm of Fate' offers a fresh take on the beloved series.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
strategy: Convert a melodic element into a rhythmic element
